  • Reference

A tibble with a comparison between the surface temperatures recorded by flights on tiles where OTM were deployed and the operative temperatures recorded by OTMs during the exact same period the flights were taking place

correction_data.Rd

A tibble with a comparison between the surface temperatures recorded by flights on tiles where OTM were deployed and the operative temperatures recorded by OTMs during the exact same period the flights were taking place

Usage

correction_data

Format

A tibble of 1114 rows and 8 columns:

latitude

A numeric column indicating latitude of a tile

longitude

A numeric column indicating longitude of a tile

year

A numeric columnindicating the year when the flight took place

doy

A numeric column indicating the day of the year when the flight took place

mod_start

A numeric column indicating the minute of the day when the flight started

mod_end

A numeric column indicating the minute of the day when the flight ended

ir_temp

A numeric column indicating the average surface temperature recorded in a tile in a given flight

op_temp

A numeric column indicating the average operative temperature recorded by an OTMs in a tile

Examples

correction_data
#> # A tibble: 1,114 × 8
#>    latitude longitude  year   doy mod_start mod_end ir_temp op_temp
#>       <dbl>     <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    25.4    30.0
#>  2     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    20.5    26.8
#>  3     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    27.8    30.3
#>  4     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    21.3    28.3
#>  5     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    28.0    33.8
#>  6     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    20.4    19.7
#>  7     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    19.1    21.3
#>  8     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    22.9    28.5
#>  9     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    22.1    28.2
#> 10     39.9     -120.  2023   236       515     519    19.9    30.5
#> # ℹ 1,104 more rows
